message: Avoid use of wget without progress bar. Use `wget --progress=dot:giga <url>`.Or consider using `-q` or `-nv` (shorthands for `--quiet` or `--no-verbose`).

Set the SHELL option -o pipefail before RUN with a pipe in it. If you are using /bin/sh in an alpine image or if your shell is symlinked to busybox then consider explicitly setting your SHELL to /bin/ash, or disable this check
Expressions don't expand in single quotes, use double quotes for that.
Want to escape a single quote? echo 'This is how it'\''s done'.
Do not use sudo as it leads to unpredictable behavior. Use a tool like gosu to enforce root

Set the SHELL option -o pipefail before RUN with a pipe in it. If you are using /bin/sh in an alpine image or if your shell is symlinked to busybox then consider explicitly setting your SHELL to /bin/ash, or disable this check

Note that A && B || C is not if-then-else. C may run when A is true.
